panels.fieldProperties.header.title: Properties
panels.project.intro:
A project is a high performance NoSQL database, where you can store every information you want to be editable by your customers

Create lists for products, news, events or every possible entity. These lists are automatically available online with the help of Campsi's RESTful API, in a concise and elegant JSON format.

With this API you can feed websites, apps or software, in minutes.

Invite people to collaborate, they will be able to edit and publish entries.
